basics.name: Norberto Carosella
basics.label: Experienced Frontend Developer with over 9 years of experience in Web Development
basics.summary: Highly motivated Front-End Developer with 9+ years of experience building user-centric web applications. Leveraging expertise in JavaScript, React, and Node.js, I create engaging and dynamic user interfaces that bridge the gap between user needs and code. Proven ability to deliver high-quality applications across diverse industries (AgTech, Crypto, Travel).  A quick learner and problem-solver, I can seamlessly integrate into new teams and hit the ground running.

work.name: BeMap
work.summary: Bemap is a Japanese company that integrates mobile features and systems, offering development for railways, Wi-Fi, security cameras, TV data, and websites.
highlights:
Developed a brand-new application using Angular 16 and TypeScript, ensuring successful on-time delivery.
Played a key role in securing new business partnerships by creating impactful Proof-of-Concepts (PoCs) in Angular 16.
Collaborated closely with backend developer and designer to deliver the frontend of a successful client project.

work.name: Autogrow | WayBeyond
work.summary: WayBeyond.io is a New Zealand company that uses data and AI to help protected crop growers optimize yield and resource use in their greenhouses.
highlights:
Developed a brand-new application using Angular 16 and TypeScript, ensuring successful on-time delivery.
Played a key role in securing new business partnerships by creating impactful Proof-of-Concepts (PoCs) in Angular 16.
Collaborated closely with backend developer and designer to deliver the frontend of a successful client project.

work.name: Kubikware | Gemini Crypto Exchange
work.summary: The Gemini crypto app lets you securely buy, sell, store, and track various cryptocurrencies, all in one place.
highlights:
Contributed to the on-time delivery of a critical mobile application for Gemini, a leading US cryptocurrency exchange, by maintaining its stability through proactive bug identification and resolution.
Enhanced user experience by implementing custom loading animations (e.g., post-purchase confirmations, screen transitions) to provide visual feedback and reduce perceived wait times.

work.name: Vault Consulting SRL | Almundo
work.summary: VAULT Consulting, a recognized Argentinian tech company for over 10 years, offers a variety of IT solutions like software development and cloud computing to national and international businesses. The Almundo app allows users to search, compare, and book flights, hotels, and travel packages.
highlights:
Collaborated with the client-side team to recommend UX/UI improvements, actively contributing to user-centric design sessions. This collaborative approach played a key role in Almundo's app growth, experiencing a surge from 50,000 to 100,000 downloads during my involvement – a significant impact for a leading Latin American travel agency.
Implemented the successful Disney Section, a promotional package that boosted sales of all-inclusive Disney trips.

work.name: Avenga / IncluiIT | www.incluit.com
work.summary: Avenga, a software development company, offers services including strategy, solution engineering, and staffing. They recently acquired IncluIT, a software development company in Córdoba, Argentina.
highlights:
Contributed to two client projects at a Consulting agency:
  * McAfee (previously Intel Security): Utilized AngularJS and Redux for maintenance and bug-fixing tasks within a secure development environment.
  * Avaya: Migrated a legacy Windows desktop application to React Native as the sole React Native developer.

work.name: Globant | www.globant.com
work.summary: Argentinian IT giant Globant helps businesses digitally transform through a blend of design, engineering, and innovation, working with major clients like Google and boasting expertise in AI and customer experience.
highlights: Supported migration and maintenance of National Geographic web app: Utilized jQuery and Knockout JS for ongoing maintenance of the existing application, and contributed to its migration to a modern stack including AngularJS, Webpack, HTML5, and SASS.

Implemented the successful "Disney Section," a promotional package that boosted sales of all-inclusive Disney trips.
